Format.ReportDescription:
This screen generates the tables and data required to run the Reportico tutorials. This assumes you have already configured the connection to your existing database in your tutorials project.

Running this process creates and populates 5 tables - reptut_film, reptut_country, reptut_loan, reptut_category and reptut_member. No database or tables are removed.

Note that some date related data is generated relevant to current date. If you wish to run tutorials again in the future it is a good idea to use the Recreate Tables to recreate the data.

To remove the tutorials tables use the Drop Tables option.

To generate the tables click on the Execute button. If the table generation fails then an appropriate error message will occur. If the table generation succeeds then you are ready to run through the example tutorials.
